#Text=Former Alberta premier Jim Prentice killed in plane crash
#Text=Saturday , October 15 , 2016

#Text=The former premier of the Canadian province of Alberta , Jim Prentice , was killed on Thursday night along with three other people after the plane they were traveling in crashed shortly after takeoff near Kelowna , British Columbia , en route to Calgary , Alberta .
#Text=File photo of Jim Prentice , 2014 .
#Text=Image : Manning Center ( flickr ) .
#Text=The plane , a Cessna Citation , departed Kelowna at 9:32 p.m. before quickly disappearing from radar sight , according to a Transportation Safety Board official , Bill Yearwood .
#Text=The National Post reported RCMP detachments in Kelowna and Lake Country were alerted to the loss of contact at 10:07 p.m. by Surrey Air Traffic Control Centre .
#Text=According to tracking site FlightAware , the plane 's last recorded data point showed it descending from an altitude of 4,800 feet at 2,200 feet per minute .
#Text=The plane crashed 18 km ( 11 miles ) north of Kelowna in a wooded are , where its wreckage was subsequently found by search crews .
#Text=Local residents noted it was raining at the time , though without heavy storms .
#Text=On the accident , Bill Yearwood stated to CTV News , " It was during climb out from Kelowna that something went wrong obviously to cause the aircraft to descend and collide with terrain . "

#Text=Officials and family identified the other passengers on the plane as optometrist Ken Gellatly , father-in-law to one of Prentice 's daughters , and businessman Sheldon Dunphy Reid , who owned stock in the plane 's operator Norjet .
#Text=Both men were from Calgary .
#Text=The plane 's pilot was Jim Kruk , a friend of Prentice .

#Text=The Prentice family stated , " Words cannot begin to express our profound shock and heartbreak at the news that our beloved husband , father and grandfather , Jim , has died in this tragic event " .
#Text=The statement also mentioned Gellatly , " also a very special man . "
#Text=They noted , " To lose two family members at once is unbelievably painful and we are certain you will appreciate and respect our wishes for privacy at this time and the coming weeks " .
#Text=Prentice , 60 , led Alberta as premier and leader of the Progressive Conservative Party from September 2014 to May 2015 , until his government was toppled in a provincial election .
#Text=Before ascending to the position , he served under the federal Conservative Party as a cabinet minister , first for Indian and Northern Affairs , then Industry , and finally the Environment .
#Text=As news broke of his death , the country 's political leaders issued tributes to Prentice .

#Text=In a press conference in Lethbridge , Alberta , Justin Trudeau , the country 's Prime Minister , described Prentice as " a strong voice for the people of Alberta and for the people of Canada " , adding Prentice 's work used an " intelligent , honest and straightforward approach " .
#Text=" I greatly enjoyed my interactions with Jim , time I spent working beside him , across from him in the House .

#Text=Stephen Harper , Trudeau 's predecessor , under whose administration Prentice served , issued a statement on Twitter ,  Laureen [ Harper 's wife ] and I were shocked and saddened to learn of the death of our friend and colleague Jim Prentice [ ... ]

#Text=Elizabeth May , leader of the Green Party of Canada , highlighted Prentice 's term of office as environment minister and his  genuine concern " for environmental protection :

column1: #Text=" My heart goes out to Jim 's wife , Karen , three daughters and grandchildren as they mourn this tragic loss " , saying the news of Prentice 's death left her " heartbroken " .
#Text=Tom Mulcair , leader of the federal NDP Party , noted that Prentice 's service to his country and province was carried out with " honour and respect " . "

#Text=Today we all mourn this tragic loss .

#Text= He was deeply loved Alberta , " said Prentice 's successor Rachel Notley , who defeated Prentice in the previous election , following which Prentice resigned as leader of the Progressive Conservative party and as a member of Alberta 's Legislative Assembly .

column1: #Text=" I benefited from his advice " .
#Text=" For Alberta , today is a day of sorrow in the face of terrible tragedy . "
#Text=Notley 's father died in a plane crash .
#Text=Prentice 's death came months after another former Canadian cabinet minister died in a plane crash , Jean Lapierre .
#Text=Lapierre , of the federal Liberal Party , died after his plane crashed on March 29 in Îles-de-la-Madeleine , Quebec .
